text: Constant Kusters Constant Kusters (born 12 December 1970 in Oosterbeek) is a Dutch politician. He is chairman of the Dutch Peoples-Union. This party has been mainly known for its Neo-Nazi conceptions. ==References== ==External links== * * * "Constant Kusters his returns for libel" - De Gelderlander * ""You know extreme: integration. Dat is legale volkerenmoord' Constant Kusters, leider van de Nederlandse Volksunie That is legal genocide "Constant Kusters, leader of the Dutch People's Union" - Trouw Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch neo-Nazis Category:Party chairs of the Netherlands Category:People from Renkum Category:Fascist politicians
title: Constant Kusters
